description: 104 Junction Road is part of a terrace facing onto Junction Road within the St John's Grove Conservation Area. 104 Junction Road comprises a basement, ground, first, second and third floors. Within 104 Junction Road there are two residential dwellings, located above a ground floor and basement commercial unit (which spreads accross 106 Junction Road. The dwellings have a dedicated entrance to an exclusive communal hallway at the side of the building on to Temlett Grove. 104 Junction Road and the adjoining property, 106 Junction Road, were purchased by my father and uncle in 1975 and have been used in the same manner in the following 47 year period since. Following the death of both of these parties, the property is now jointly owned by myself, my brother and our Company , E.D.Elson Ltd, in the proportion 25%:25%:50%. This application concerns the unit, Flat 2 104B Junction Road (second and third floor levels) only. The location of this unit configuration is identified as Flat 2-104B Junction Road on the application drawings
